Text:
.

Hi, everyone! :)

I purchased the audiobook version of "The Son of Neptune" by Rick Riordan a day after it came out, and it is always a special occasion when the book and audiobook are released on the same day!

I just now finished splitting it in to chapters and enhanced the wave form a little. It also is properly tagged, has cover art, and contains various ebook formats. Thanks to all whose work is included in this torrent release! :)

enjoy!

.
Thanks so much! I love this series.
Glitch man..  You are now one of my Fave uploader. Thanks man. I have a fair few list of books is there any in Discworld, Potter, Riordan, Ender or any you are looking for?
